member.name: T:WorldDomination.Net.IPAddressExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for the IPAddress class.

member.name: M:WorldDomination.Net.IPAddressExtensions.Registry(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.remarks:
What the hell is this? Wiki knows all :- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regional_Internet_Registry/
Expected values are: Reserved, IANA, IETF, APCNIC, ARIN, LACNIC, RIPENCC and AFRINIC.

member.name: M:WorldDomination.Net.IPAddressExtensions.AssignedDateTime(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary: The date this IP or block was assigned.
member.remarks: If the date was unknown when assigned, a null value is returned.
member.returns: The date and time in UTC if known, otherwise null.
